dc_description_s: Storm Sewer Shed System areas. The dataset contains locations and attributes of storm sewer systemsC. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. This shapefile contains all storm sewer systems including the combined sewersheds within the DC WASA jurisdiction. There are small areas within this file Combined flow should enter these areas only when it overflows from the interceptors. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
